Package it.seba.juno.controller

Class OptionsController

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.controller.OptionsController
public class OptionsController extends Object
Controls both the OptionsView and the OptionsModel of the program, it assigns actions to the OptionsView components.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

  • Constructor Details

    • OptionsController

      public OptionsController(OptionsModel optionsModel, MainView mainView, MenuView menuView, OptionsView optionsView)
      Class Constructor.
      Parameters:
      optionsModel - the option model, contains the data about options.
      mainView - the main view, used to host all others view.
      menuView - the menu view, show the main menu.
      optionsView - the options view, show options.
